sections.body: Fate is a powerful tool for those who dole out justice for their deity. You can read the strands of fate, and those strands guide your endeavors.
Once per day, you can use augury as a spell-like ability.
sections.name: Augury
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Inquisitor/Inquisitions/Fate Inquisition/Granted Powers/Augury

sections.body: At 8th level, when you use your augury spell-like ability, you gain a benefit that lasts until the end of your next combat. If the result was “weal,” all curing effects used on you cure an additional +1d10 hit points. If the result was “woe,” your melee attacks deal an additional +1d6 points of damage. If the result is “weal and woe” or “nothing,” you gain a +2 insight bonus to your Armor Class.
sections.name: Agent of Fate
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Inquisitor/Inquisitions/Fate Inquisition/Granted Powers/Agent of Fate

sections.name: Granted Powers
